info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: BOYSEN®® Patching Compound is a powder-type product that is added into paint to prepare a job-site-mixed putty that can be used to patch holes and minor surface imperfections up to 1mm on concrete and drywall substrates.

info.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
info.body: Mix 1 to 1.5-kg of BOYSEN®® Patching Compound with 4-Liters of latex paint.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Surface to be painted should be clean and dry, free from dust, dirt, and other contaminants.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.subtitle: Drywall Substrates
info.body: Install and secure joints as per manufacturer's recommendation.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body: Primer: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Flat B‑701 Putty: BOYSEN®® Patching Compound (mixed with latex paint) Primer: BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ Flat B‑701 Topcoat: Any water-based paint (BOYSEN®® Permacoat™ , BOYSEN®® Healthy Home™ , Virtuoso™ Silk Touch™ )
